short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help you to write better AI prompts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock the full potential of prompt engineering with Prompt Expert, a Chrome Extension designed to simplify the art of crafting effective prompts. 

Fill out the form, generate the answer and paste it into ChatGPT, Claude, etc.

Better prompts, better results—that’s the power of Prompt Expert.
